summary: Results-driven Full Stack Developer with around 6 years of experience designing and developing scalable web applications. Strong collaborator with a passion for optimizing performance, writing clean, maintainable code, and leading cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality solutions.

skills: Firebase (Auth, Storage, Realtime DB, Cloud Messaging)

workExperience.title: Software Development Engineer - III (Full Stack)
responsibilities: Developed full-stack features (React/Node.js) to enhance network technician efficiency, collaborating with product owners and users to gather requirements and deliver end-to-end solutions.
Managed Linux development and production servers via SSH, handled Node.js microservices with PM2, and supported deployments and troubleshooting.
Improved full-stack performance: optimized React rendering, implemented frontend caching, reduced API response times, and enhanced database queries with indexes and partitions.
Maintained code quality and security through regular SonarQube and Fortify checks while deploying through Jenkins pipeline.
Monitored and optimized APIs and user experience using New Relic and Quantum Metrics for real-time issue detection and resolution.

workExperience.title: Senior Software Engineer - Front End
responsibilities: Led a team of 6 developers to build a responsive NFT e-commerce platform, driving end-to-end development and cross-functional collaboration.
Developed and integrated multiple micro frontends with shared state management, ensuring modular architecture, seamless integration, and reusable code.
Monitored Lighthouse metrics including First Contentful Paint (FCP), Largest Contentful Paint (LCP), accessibility, and SEO, optimizing performance to achieve 100% scores across all categories.

Optimized client performance and SEO by implementing lazy loading, memoization, SSR/ISR, image optimization, service workers, metadata (titles, descriptions, OG/Twitter tags), and migrating from React to Next.js.
Built and maintained a custom responsive component library and transformed the app into a PWA with offline support, push notifications, and efficient client-side caching for enhanced user experience.

workExperience.title: Senior Systems Engineer
responsibilities: Designed, developed, and maintained a large-scale, consumer-facing React application, ensuring high performance, scalability, and intuitive UX.
Practiced Test-Driven Development (TDD) using Jest, writing and maintaining unit tests to ensure code reliability and high test coverage.
Collaborated across multiple scrum teams in an agile environment through iterative development cycles.
Developed microservices using Java Spring Boot for e-commerce applications, ensuring efficient backend functionality.

projects.title: BrowserUse
description: Contributed to Browser Use, an open-source project which uses LLM and Playwright to autonomously execute natural language prompts to accomplish various tasks in browser.

projects.title: ShopRMC
description: Built a highly responsive full-stack e-commerce platform using Next.js, leveraging AI for quick commerce, integrated as a Progressive Web App (PWA) and converted into an Android app via Trusted Web Activities (TWA), with plans for ONDC integration.

achievementsAndCertificates.title: Won in a Figma to React Gen Al Hackathon
achievementsAndCertificates.description: Built an App that can create a React application based on the given Figma wireframe JSON data which uses the custom MUI component library.

achievementsAndCertificates.title: Prompt Engineering for Developers (Coursera certification)
achievementsAndCertificates.description: Learned about LLM integrations through API to enhance app functionalities.

achievementsAndCertificates.title: Machine Learning Specialization (Coursera Certification)
achievementsAndCertificates.description: Learned about Creating, training and tuning Machine learning and basic Deeplearning modals out of own interest.
